org.ow2.chameleon.core.services

Interface StabilityChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStabilityChecker, BundleStabilityChecker, IPojoProcessingStabilityChecker, ServiceStabilityChecker

    public interface StabilityChecker
    Service exposed to extend the stability computation. All provider exposing this service are involved in the stability computation. The priority of each checker lets order the check in a sequence. Low priority are executed first, while higher priority are executed at the end of the computation.

    Be pretty careful when implementing this service:

    • The process (check()) tries to reach the stability criteria
    • The caller thread is blocked, so fail the stability after a reasonable timeout
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.5 $Id
    See Also:
    Stability

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StabilityResult check()
      Tries to reach the stability criteria checked by the current checker.
      String getName()
      Gets the name of the checker.
      int getPriority()
      Gets the checker priority.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the name of the checker. This is used to identify failed checks.
        Returns:
        the checker name, human-friendly.

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        Gets the checker priority. Low priorities are executed first.
        Returns:
        the priority of the checker

      • check

        StabilityResult check()
        Tries to reach the stability criteria checked by the current checker.
        Returns:
        the stability result
